Title: OpenSource.Web.FontPicker
Description: This is a web based font picker control for ASP.NET . It has been designed to be the same as the Windows font picker dialog. Now it only works in IE.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a web based font picker control for ASP.NET . It has been designed to be the same as the Windows font picker dialog. Now it only works in IE.

I am creating a complex web project. During this, I created some useful components and I thought it's good to share them with others. this is one of them. The others will be coming soon.
Surly it has so many lacks and I need your help to improve it. So feel free to send me bug reports and suggestions. I'll be happy if you can fix the bugs yourself and send me the source code.
Thanks.
Mahmood Dehghan
8/12/2007

Other projects are :

  • Web ColorPicker
  • CompressedList
  • RTF Writer
